intro.p2: My name is Rowin Ruizendaal and I graduated in 2022 from the bachelor communication and multimedia design at the Hogeschool van Amsterdam
intro.p3: During my studies I managed to specialize in front-end development, where I started learning PHP programming and finding my way around the JavaScript world.
intro.p4: From this point on I work on my own projects and constantly learn new things.
intro.p5: Feel free to explore my portfolio and learn more about me.
intro.p6: You can use the gamepad to move around the map.
intro.p7: You can walk using the WASD keys to move around the map.
